dashboard.title: Privacy Dashboard
dashboard.excellent: Excellent! Your privacy is well protected
dashboard.good: Good, but there's room for improvement
dashboard.at_risk: Warning: Your privacy is at risk
dashboard.max_protection_desc: Block all telemetry, disable permissions, and add firewall rules
dashboard.quick_cleanup_desc: Clear tracking data, caches, and reset advertising ID

telemetry.title: Telemetry & Tracking
telemetry.subtitle: Manage Windows data collection and scheduled tasks

permissions.title: App Permissions
permissions.subtitle: Manage access to Camera, Microphone, and more
permissions.global_desc: Allow apps to access this resource
permissions.no_apps: No apps found with this permission

cleanup.title: Tracking Cleanup
cleanup.subtitle: Remove activity history, cache, and tracking identifiers

firewall.title: Firewall Rules
firewall.subtitle: Block Microsoft telemetry servers at the network level
firewall.admin_warning: Administrator privileges required to manage firewall rules

updates.title: Windows Updates
updates.subtitle: Control how and when your system updates
updates.desc_notify: You will be notified when updates are available.

admin.title: Admin Rights Required
admin.message: This application requires Administrator privileges to function correctly.
admin.description:
Features like Firewall control, Windows Update management, and System Cleanup need admin rights.

Please restart the application as Administrator.

restore.title: System Backup
restore.error: Failed to create restore point. Ensure System Restore is enabled.
